alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Dodge; Laurens; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 4:31PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Laurens, northwestern Dodge, southeastern Twiggs and Bleckley Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 431 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a line of strong storms within a tropical rain band along a line extending from near Royal to near Gresston, and moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Enhanced risk of a brief tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Storms embedded within a tropical rainband have exhibited localized rotation. A brief tornado could quickly form. Locations impacted include... Cochran, Jeffersonville, Chester, Allentown, Dubois, Coley Station, Gresston, Empire, Yonkers, Roddy, Rowland, Royal, District Path, Goldsboro, Rebie and Cary. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for central Georgia.
